item.title: Elasticsearch Highlighting Techniques
item.description: Three Elasticsearch highlighter methods including Unified, Plain, and FVH, along with efficient offset strategies using Postings List and Term Vectors

item.title: Elasticsearch Pagination Technique
item.description: Comparing Elasticsearch pagination methods including From/Size, Search After, and Scroll, with stable paging implementation using PIT (Point In Time)

item.title: What is Nginx? Evolution and Architecture of Web Servers
item.description: A comprehensive guide covering high-performance web server Nginx concepts, Apache comparison, Event-Driven architecture, and practical features used in production
